article:
'Motif' is a word used by folklorists who analyze, interpret, and describe the
traditional elements found in the lore of particular folk groups and compare the
folklore of various regions and cultures of the world based on these motif
patterns. Ultimately, folklorists identify motifs in folklore to interpret
where, how, and why these motifs are used, so they can understand the values,
customs, and ways of life of unique cultures.

In cultural anthropology and folkloristics, the meaning of motif encompasses the
meanings of motif used in the areas of music, literary criticism, visual arts,
and textile arts because folklorists study motifs (i.e., recurring elements) in
each of these areas, motifs that create recognizable patterns in folklore and
folk-art traditions.
